AI.tldr: 本文通过自洽无序平均方法计算了二维Yukawa-Sachdev-Ye-Kitaev模型在垂直磁场下的直流磁导率张量，发现了非玻尔兹曼频率依赖自能导致的磁输运系数随温度和相互作用强度的非平凡演化。
AI.motivation: 为强关联电子系统中的奇异金属相线性磁输运实验提供受控理论框架，研究YSYK相互作用与晶格嵌入之间的相互作用。
AI.method: 使用自洽无序平均方法求解二维YSYK鞍点方程，获得局域能量依赖的费米子自能，然后在Kubo形式中计算纵向和霍尔电导率等输运系数。
AI.result: 发现了霍尔角余切和载流子迁移率倒数随温度的超线性演化，同时电阻率呈线性温度依赖，在低温边际费米液体基态之上的扩展交叉区域中出现。
AI.conclusion: 该模型为解释强关联固态电子系统中奇异金属相的线性磁输运实验提供了受控理论框架。

title: Charged impurity scattering in two-dimensional topological insulators with Mexican-hat dispersion
summary:
Scattering by charged impurities is known to mainly determine transport
properties of electrons in modern quantum materials, but it remains poorly
studied for materials with Mexican hat dispersion. Due to such nontrivial
features as a singular density of states and a ring-shaped Fermi surface,
electron-electron interaction and electron transitions between different
isoenergetic contours are of key importance in this materials. We show that
these factors significantly affect both the spatial profile of the screened
potential of Coulomb centers and the dependence of mobility on temperature and
electron density. The screened potential is calculated within the random phase
approximation. The transport properties are determined without using the usual
relaxation time approximation, since the distribution function in energy space
is a vector defined by a system of two equations.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了墨西哥帽色散材料中带电杂质散射对电子输运性质的影响，重点分析了电子-电子相互作用和不同等能轮廓间电子跃迁的关键作用。
AI.motivation: 带电杂质散射主要决定现代量子材料中电子的输运性质，但对于具有墨西哥帽色散的材料研究较少。这类材料具有奇异的态密度和环形费米面等非平凡特征，需要深入研究电子-电子相互作用和电子跃迁的影响。
AI.method: 在随机相位近似下计算库仑中心的屏蔽势，不使用通常的弛豫时间近似来确定输运性质，而是通过由两个方程定义的向量分布函数来描述能量空间中的分布函数。
AI.result: 研究发现电子-电子相互作用和电子跃迁显著影响屏蔽势的空间分布以及迁移率对温度和电子密度的依赖关系。
AI.conclusion: 对于墨西哥帽色散材料，电子-电子相互作用和不同等能轮廓间的电子跃迁是决定其输运性质的关键因素，这些因素显著改变了屏蔽势和迁移率的行为特征。

title: Narrow magneto-optical transitions in Erbium implanted silicon carbide-on-insulator
summary:
Solid state spin photon interfaces operating in the near telecom and telecom
bands are a key resource for long distance quantum communication and scalable
quantum networks. However, their optical transitions often suffer from spectral
diffusion that hampers the generation of coherent spin photon entanglement.
Here we demonstrate narrow magneto-optical transitions of erbium dopants
implanted into thin film silicon carbide (SiC)-on-insulator, a viable platform
for industrially scalable quantum networks. Using high-resolution resonant
spectroscopy and spectral hole burning at cryogenic temperatures, we reveal sub
megahertz homogeneous linewidths and identify two lattice sites that best
stabilise the emitters. We further characterise their optical lifetimes and
magneto-optical response, establishing erbium doped SiC-on-insulator as a
robust and scalable platform for on-chip quantum networks.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了在绝缘体上碳化硅薄膜中植入铒掺杂剂形成的窄磁光跃迁，为可扩展量子网络提供了稳健平台。
AI.motivation: 固态自旋光子接口在远距离量子通信和可扩展量子网络中至关重要，但其光学跃迁常受光谱扩散影响，阻碍相干自旋光子纠缠的生成。
AI.method: 使用高分辨率共振光谱和光谱烧孔技术在低温下研究铒掺杂剂在绝缘体上碳化硅薄膜中的特性，包括均匀线宽、光学寿命和磁光响应。
AI.result: 揭示了亚兆赫兹的均匀线宽，识别了两个最佳稳定发射器的晶格位点，并表征了其光学寿命和磁光响应特性。
AI.conclusion: 铒掺杂绝缘体上碳化硅被确立为片上量子网络的稳健且可扩展平台。

title: Thermal tuning of dynamic response in Ag-based nanowire networks
summary:
Self-assembled networks of metallic nanowires (NWs) are being intensively
explored as test benches for neuromorphic proposals. In this work, we study the
electric transport properties of dense self-assembled networks of Ag-based NWs
(AgNWNs) coated with a thin insulating layer, using DC and AC stimuli. The
building blocks of this network are the metallic NWs and the NW-NW junctions,
either metallic or memristive. In the pristine state, frequency independence of
the impedance reveals an over-percolated purely resistive network. A
combination of low-temperature annealing and AC stimulus is shown to
drastically affect the resistivity of the sample (interpreted as a depopulation
of purely metallic junctions), unveiling a rich dynamic response. This
procedure triggers the achievement of a capacitive response, which is
successfully rationalized using a previously introduced 'two junction model'.
Thermal treatment appears to be an indirect strategy to effectively modify the
humidity content at the NW-NW intersections and, consequently, enable multiple
switching schemes suitable for brain-like processing alternatives.

AI.tldr: 研究了具有绝缘涂层的银纳米线自组装网络的电传输特性，发现通过低温退火和AC刺激可以显著改变网络电阻并触发电容响应，揭示了适用于类脑处理的多重切换机制。
AI.motivation: 探索金属纳米线自组装网络作为神经形态计算平台的潜力，特别是研究网络中的金属-金属连接和忆阻连接的动态响应特性。
AI.method: 使用DC和AC刺激研究密集自组装银纳米线网络的电传输特性，结合低温退火处理，采用'双连接模型'分析网络行为。
AI.result: 原始状态下网络呈现纯电阻特性，经过退火和AC刺激后电阻显著变化，出现电容响应，揭示了NW-NW连接处湿度含量对开关行为的影响。
AI.conclusion: 热处理是有效调控纳米线连接处湿度含量的间接策略，能够实现适用于类脑处理的多重切换方案。

title: Field-Tunable Anisotropic Fulde-Ferrell Phase in NbSe$_2$/CrSiTe$_3$ Heterostructures
summary:
The emergence of superconductivity in two-dimensional transition metal
dichalcogenides with strong spin orbit coupling (SOC) has opened new avenues
for exploring exotic superconducting states. Here, we report experimental
observation of an anisotropic Fulde-Ferrell (FF) phase in few-layer
NbSe$_2$/CrSiTe$_3$ heterostructures under in-plane magnetic fields. Through
combined magnetoresistance and nonreciprocal transport measurements, we find
that due to the couplings from the ferromagnetic CrSiTe$_3$, a half-dome-shaped
region emerges in the magnetic field-temperature ($B$-$T$) diagram.
Importantly, the half-dome-shaped region exhibits finite second harmonic
resistance with in-plane anisotropy, indicating that the superconducting state
is an anisotropic FF phase. Through a symmetry analysis combined with mean
field calculations, we attribute the emergent anisotropic FF phase to the
CrSiTe$_3$ layer induced Rashba SOC and three-fold rotational symmetry
breaking. These results demonstrate that heterostructure stacking is a powerful
tool for symmetry engineering in superconductors, which can advance the design
of quantum devices in atomically thin superconducting materials.

AI.tldr: 在NbSe2/CrSiTe3异质结构中观察到各向异性Fulde-Ferrell相，这是由CrSiTe3层诱导的Rashba自旋轨道耦合和三重旋转对称性破缺导致的
AI.motivation: 探索二维过渡金属二硫化物中强自旋轨道耦合产生的奇异超导态，特别是通过异质结构堆叠进行对称性工程
AI.method: 结合磁阻和非互易输运测量，通过对称性分析和平均场计算
AI.result: 在面内磁场下的B-T相图中出现半穹顶区域，显示有限二阶谐波电阻和面内各向异性，表明存在各向异性FF相
AI.conclusion: 异质结构堆叠是超导体中对称性工程的有力工具，可推进原子级薄超导材料中量子器件的设计

title: Thermodynamic Length in Stochastic Thermodynamics of Far-From-Equilibrium Systems: Unification of Fluctuation Relation and Thermodynamic Uncertainty Relation
summary:
The Boltzmann distribution for an equilibrium system constrains the
statistics of the system by the energetics. Despite the non-equilibrium
generalization of the Boltzmann distribution being studied extensively, a
unified framework valid for far-from-equilibrium discrete state systems is
lacking. Here, we derive an exact path-integral representation for discrete
state processes and represent it using the exponential of the action for
stochastic transition dynamics. Solving the variational problem, the effective
action is shown to be equal to the inferred entropy production rate (a
thermodynamic quantity) and a non-quadratic dissipation function of the
thermodynamic length (TL) defined for microscopic stochastic currents (a
dynamic quantity). This formulates a far-from-equilibrium analog of the
Boltzmann distribution, namely, the minimum action principle. The non-quadratic
dissipation function is physically attributed to incorporating non-Gaussian
fluctuations or far-from-equilibrium non-conservative driving. Further, an
exact large deviation dynamical rate functional is derived. The equivalence of
the variational formulation with the information geometric formulation is
proved. The non-quadratic TL recovers the non-quadratic thermodynamic-kinetic
uncertainty relation (TKUR) and the speed limits, which are tighter than the
close-to-equilibrium quadratic formulations. Moreover, if the transition
affinities are known, the non-quadratic TL recovers the fluctuation relation
(FR). The minimum action principle manifests the non-quadratic TKUR and FR as
two faces corresponding to the thermodynamic inference and partial control
descriptions, respectively. In addition, the validity of these results is
extended to coarse-grained observable currents, strengthening the
experimental/numerical applicability of them.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个远离平衡态离散状态系统的统一框架，通过最小作用量原理建立了玻尔兹曼分布的远离平衡态类比，推导了非二次耗散函数的热力学长度，并证明了与信息几何公式的等价性。
AI.motivation: 虽然平衡系统的玻尔兹曼分布已被广泛研究，但远离平衡态离散状态系统的统一框架仍然缺乏，需要建立有效的理论描述。
AI.method: 推导了离散状态过程的精确路径积分表示，通过变分问题求解有效作用量，建立了最小作用量原理，并证明了与信息几何公式的等价性。
AI.result: 得到了比接近平衡态二次公式更严格的热力学-动力学不确定性关系和速度极限，如果已知跃迁亲和力，还能恢复涨落关系。
AI.conclusion: 最小作用量原理将非二次热力学-动力学不确定性关系和涨落关系统一为热力学推断和部分控制描述的两个方面，这些结果可扩展到粗粒化可观测量电流，增强了实验/数值应用性。

authors: Luis Felipe Sanz Juan Antonio González
title: Volumetric and viscosity data of 1-iodonaphthalene + n-alkanes mixture at (288.15-308.15) K
summary:
Density and viscosity measurements have been performed for the systems
1-iodonaphthalene + heptane, or + decane, or + dodecane, or + tetradecane over
the temperature range (288.15-308.15) K and atmospheric pressure. At this end,
a densitometer Anton-Paar DMA 602 and a Ubbelohde viscosimeter were used.
Excess molar volumes are large and negative and decrease when the temperature
is increased, which reveals that the main contribution to the excess molar
volume arises from structural effects. The values of the deviations of dynamic
viscosity from linear dependence on mole fraction are also large and negative,
indicating that n-alkanes are good breakers of the interactions between
1-iodonaphthalene molecules. Different models were applied for describing
viscosity data. McAllister's equation correlates well with kinematic
viscosities. Results are similar when dynamic viscosities are correlated with
the Grunberg-Nissan or Fang-He equations. This means that size effects are not
relevant to the mentioned data. The adjustable parameter of the Grunberg-Nissan
equation is negative for all the systems at any temperature, a typical feature
of systems where dispersive interactions are dominant. This is in agreement
with findings obtained in previous studies on similar n-alkane mixtures
involving C$_6$H$_5$X (X = Cl, Br, I) or 1,2,4-trichlorobenzene or
1-chloronaphthalene. Free volume effects have little influence on the present
dynamic viscosity results, well represented by the absolute rate model using
residual molar Gibbs energies obtained from the DISQUAC model.

AI.tldr: 测量了1-碘萘与不同烷烃混合物的密度和粘度，发现过量摩尔体积为负值且随温度升高而减小，表明结构效应是主要贡献。粘度偏差也为负值，表明烷烃能破坏1-碘萘分子间的相互作用。
AI.motivation: 研究1-碘萘与烷烃混合物的热物理性质，了解分子间相互作用和结构效应对混合物性质的影响。
AI.method: 使用密度计和粘度计在288.15-308.15K温度范围内测量密度和粘度，应用McAllister方程、Grunberg-Nissan方程和Fang-He方程等模型分析粘度数据。
AI.result: 过量摩尔体积为负值且随温度升高而减小，粘度偏差也为负值，表明烷烃能有效破坏1-碘萘分子间的相互作用。Grunberg-Nissan方程的参数为负值，表明色散相互作用占主导。
AI.conclusion: 结构效应是过量摩尔体积的主要贡献因素，烷烃能破坏1-碘萘分子间的相互作用，色散相互作用在系统中占主导地位，自由体积效应对粘度结果影响较小。

title: Improved contraction of finite projected entangled pair states
summary:
We present an improved version of the algorithm contracting and optimizing
finite projected entangled pair states (fPEPS) in conjunction with projected
entangled pair operators (PEPOs). Our work has two components to it. First, we
explain in detail the characteristic contraction patterns that occur in fPEPS
calculations and how to slice them such that peak memory occupation remains
minimal while ensuring efficient parallel computation. Second, we combine
controlled bond expansion [A. Gleis, J.-W. Li, and J. von Delft, Phys. Rev.
Lett. 130, 246402 (2023)] with randomized singular value decomposition [V.
Rokhlin, A. Szlam, and M. Tygert, SIAM J. Matrix Anal. Appl. (2009)] and apply
it throughout the fPEPS algorithm. We present benchmark results for the Hubbard
model for system sizes up to 8x8 and SU(2) symmetric bond dimension of up to D
= 6 for PEPS bonds and $\chi$ = 500 for the environment bonds. Finally, we
comment on the state and future of the fPEPS-PEPO framework.

AI.tldr: 提出了改进的有限投影纠缠对态（fPEPS）与投影纠缠对算符（PEPO）的收缩优化算法，包含高效内存管理和并行计算策略，以及结合控制键扩展与随机SVD的技术。
AI.motivation: 解决fPEPS计算中的内存占用问题和计算效率问题，通过优化收缩模式和引入先进数值方法提升算法性能。
AI.method: 详细分析fPEPS计算中的特征收缩模式，采用切片技术最小化内存占用并确保高效并行计算；结合控制键扩展与随机奇异值分解技术应用于整个fPEPS算法。
AI.result: 在Hubbard模型上进行了基准测试，系统尺寸达到8x8，SU(2)对称键维度PEPS键D=6，环境键χ=500，展示了算法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 讨论了fPEPS-PEPO框架的当前状态和未来发展前景。

title: Negative dynamic conductance of a quantum wire with unscreened Coulomb interaction
summary:
Dynamic conductance and time-of-flight current instability in a quantum wire
connected to electron reservoirs under DC bias voltage are studied in the
absence of a gate screening the Coulomb interaction of electrons. Due to a
strong electron-electron interaction, dramatic rearrangements of the charge
density distribution and the potential landscape in the wire occur at a
sufficiently high DC bias voltage. The applied voltage is screened mainly near
the cathode contact, and an almost flat potential profile is established in the
most of the wire. Thus, the size of the region of a population inversion of
electronic states greatly increases, and the band of wave vectors that form
unstable modes of electronic waves significantly reduces. As a result, the
conditions for the occurrence of the time-of-flight instability are greatly
facilitated and the negative dynamic conductivity increases.

AI.tldr: 研究量子线在无栅极屏蔽情况下的动态电导和渡越时间电流不稳定性，发现强电子相互作用在高压偏压下导致电荷密度和电势分布重组，阴极附近形成主要屏蔽区，促进渡越时间不稳定性发生并增加负动态电导。
AI.motivation: 研究在无栅极屏蔽库仑相互作用的情况下，量子线在直流偏压下的动态电导和渡越时间电流不稳定性，探索强电子-电子相互作用对电荷分布和电势分布的影响。
AI.method: 通过分析强电子-电子相互作用下，量子线在足够高直流偏压下的电荷密度分布和电势分布重组过程，研究阴极接触附近的电压屏蔽效应。
AI.result: 施加的电压主要在阴极接触附近被屏蔽，在导线大部分区域形成几乎平坦的电势分布，导致电子态布居反转区域尺寸增大，不稳定电子波模式波矢带显著减小。
AI.conclusion: 这些变化大大促进了渡越时间不稳定性的发生条件，并增加了负动态电导率。

title: Point-contact enhanced superconductivity in trigonal PtBi2: quest for the origin of high-Tc
summary:
We studied enhanced superconductivity in point contacts (PCs) based on a
type-I Weyl semimetal t-PtBi2 using both normal metal (Ag, Cu, Pt) and
ferromagnetic (Fe, Co, Ni) tips by measuring the differential resistance
dV/dI(V) curves. In most cases, the value of the superconducting critical
temperature Tc ranges between 3 and 5 K, which is several times higher than the
maximal bulk Tc. At the same time, among dozens of PCs with higher Tc, a few of
them reach Tc up to 8 K, including those with both normal and ferromagnetic
tips. The critical magnetic field is also highly enhanced in PCs and reaches up
to several Tesla. The common reason for the Tc increase may be related to
pressure/strain caused at the PC's formation. Moreover, a greater increase in
Tc is observed for PCs formed at the edge of the sample flake than for those
formed on the plane. The results also reveal that the growth of Tc in PCs based
on t-PtBi2 is compatible with ferromagnetism in Fe, Co, and Ni tips, initiating
discussion as to the possible non-trivial nature of enhanced superconductivity.
Anyway, our findings suggest that t-PtBi2 is a promising candidate for
realizing topological superconductivity at more accessible temperatures

AI.tldr: 在t-PtBi2 Weyl半金属点接触中观察到超导临界温度Tc显著增强，从3-5K到最高8K，临界磁场也大幅提升，可能与压力/应变效应有关，且与铁磁尖端兼容。
AI.motivation: 研究t-PtBi2 Weyl半金属中点接触结构对超导性能的增强效应，探索在更易达到的温度下实现拓扑超导性的可能性。
AI.method: 使用正常金属（Ag、Cu、Pt）和铁磁金属（Fe、Co、Ni）尖端在t-PtBi2上形成点接触，测量微分电阻dV/dI(V)曲线来研究超导特性。
AI.result: 点接触中超导临界温度Tc显著提高至3-5K（最高8K），比块体材料高数倍；临界磁场达数特斯拉；边缘形成的点接触Tc提升更明显；与铁磁尖端兼容。
AI.conclusion: t-PtBi2是实现拓扑超导性的有前景候选材料，点接触中的压力/应变效应是Tc增强的主要原因，且这种增强与铁磁性兼容，暗示可能的非平凡超导性质。

title: Generalized Finite-time Optimal Control Framework in Stochastic Thermodynamics
summary:
Optimal processes in stochastic thermodynamics are a frontier for
understanding the control and design of non-equilibrium systems, with broad
practical applications in biology, chemistry, and nanoscale/mesoscale systems.
Optimal mass transport theory and thermodynamic geometry have emerged as
optimal control methodology, but they are based on slow-driving and close to
equilibrium assumptions. An optimal control framework in stochastic
thermodynamics for finite time driving is still elusive. Therefore, we solve in
this paper an optimal control problem for changing the control parameters of a
discrete-state far-from-equilibrium process from an initial to a final value in
finite-time. Optimal driving protocols are derived that minimize the total
finite-time dissipation cost for the driving process. Our framework reveals
that discontinuous endpoint jumps are a generic, model-independent physical
mechanism that minimizes the optimal driving entropy production, whose
importance is further amplified for far-from-equilibrium systems. The
thermodynamic and dynamic physical interpretation and understanding of
discontinuous endpoint jumps is formulated. An exact mapping between the
finite-time to slow driving optimal control formulation is elucidated,
developing the state-of-the-art of optimal mass transport theory and
thermodynamic geometry, which has been the current paradigm for studying
optimal processes in stochastic thermodynamics that relies on slow driving
assumptions. Our framework opens up a plethora of applications to the
thermodynamically efficient control of a far-from-equilibrium system in
finite-time, which opens up a way to their efficient design principles.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个有限时间驱动下离散态远平衡过程的最优控制框架，通过端点跳跃机制最小化熵产生，突破了传统慢驱动假设的限制
AI.motivation: 随机热力学中的最优过程控制对非平衡系统设计和控制至关重要，但现有方法基于慢驱动和近平衡假设，缺乏有限时间驱动的最优控制框架
AI.method: 解决离散态远平衡过程在有限时间内改变控制参数的最优控制问题，推导最小化总耗散成本的最优驱动协议，发现端点跳跃是通用机制
AI.result: 揭示了不连续端点跳跃是减少最优驱动熵产生的通用物理机制，在远平衡系统中尤为重要，建立了有限时间与慢驱动最优控制之间的精确映射
AI.conclusion: 该框架为远平衡系统在有限时间内的热力学高效控制开辟了应用前景，推动了最优质量输运理论和热力学几何的发展

title: Polaronic-Distortion-Driven Enhancement of Excitonic Auger Recombination in ZnO Nanoparticles
summary:
The surface effect and quantum confinement render nanomaterials the
optoelectronic properties more susceptible to nonradiative processes than their
bulk counterparts. These nonradiative processes usually contain a series of
interwoven and competing sub-processes, which are challenging to disentangle.
Here, we investigate the structural origin of Auger recombination in ZnO
nanoparticles using transient absorption spectroscopy and ultrafast electron
diffraction. The photogenerated hot holes are captured by oxygen vacancies
through an Auger mechanism, inducing significant local structural distortions
around the oxygen vacancy and its neighboring zinc tetrahedron on a
sub-picosecond timescale. The recombination of trapped holes accelerates the
lattice thermalization and stabilizes the formed small hole polarons.
Subsequently, the recombination of localized polarons forms a confined
exciton-polaron complex that may account for the long-lived (>7 ns) visible
luminescence observed in ZnO nanoparticles. Our findings are potentially
applicable to other transition metal oxide nanomaterials, bringing insights for
the optimization of their functional properties.

AI.tldr: 通过瞬态吸收光谱和超快电子衍射研究ZnO纳米颗粒中俄歇复合的结构起源，发现光生热空穴通过俄歇机制被氧空位捕获，诱导局部结构畸变，形成空穴极化子，最终产生长寿命可见发光。
AI.motivation: 纳米材料由于表面效应和量子限制使其光电性质更容易受到非辐射过程影响，但这些过程通常包含一系列交织竞争的亚过程，难以区分。
AI.method: 使用瞬态吸收光谱和超快电子衍射研究ZnO纳米颗粒中的俄歇复合过程。
AI.result: 发现光生热空穴通过俄歇机制被氧空位捕获，在亚皮秒时间尺度上诱导氧空位及其邻近锌四面体的显著局部结构畸变，形成空穴极化子，最终产生长寿命（>7 ns）可见发光。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现可能适用于其他过渡金属氧化物纳米材料，为其功能性能优化提供见解。

title: Non Fermi-Liquid Magnetoresistance Oscillations in Quasi-One-Dimensional Conductors
summary:
We theoretically demonstrate that strong non Fermi-liquid magnetic
oscillations of electron-electron scattering time can exist in
quasi-one-dimensional (Q1D) conductors under condition of the magnetic
breakdown between two open electron orbits. They are shown to be due to
electron-electron interactions in a metallic phase under condition of the
magnetic breakdown and they are beyond the Fermi-liquid theory. In particular,
we consider as example the organic conductor (TMTSF)$_2$ClO$_4$ and perform
both analytical and numerical calculations for its known electron spectrum. We
also argue that similar oscillations of resistivity can exist in a metallic
phase of another Q1D organic conductor - (Per)$_2$Au(mnt)$_2$.

AI.tldr: 本文理论证明了在准一维导体中，在磁击穿条件下，电子-电子散射时间会出现强烈的非费米液体磁振荡现象。
AI.motivation: 研究准一维导体在磁击穿条件下的电子-电子相互作用，探索超出费米液体理论的现象。
AI.method: 以有机导体(TMTSF)$_2$ClO$_4$为例，对其已知电子谱进行解析和数值计算分析。
AI.result: 发现了电子-电子散射时间的强非费米液体磁振荡，这些振荡源于磁击穿条件下金属相中的电子-电子相互作用。
AI.conclusion: 类似电阻率振荡现象也可能存在于其他准一维有机导体如(Per)$_2$Au(mnt)$_2$的金属相中。

title: Tuning the Electronic Structure of Graphene by Controlling Spatial Confinement
summary:
The electronic properties of a material depend on the spatial freedom of the
electron wavefunction. A well-known example is graphite, which is a
conventional gapless semiconductor, while a single layer of it, graphene,
exhibits extremely high electronic conductivity. Nevertheless, graphene ribbons
can have different physical properties, such as a tunable band gap, from
gapless to large band gap semiconductor. The purpose of this study is to
investigate the electronic structure of graphene few-layers composed of a layer
of graphene nanoribbons and graphene sheet(s), %\textcolor{blue}{or a
Sheebbon}, where quasi-one-dimensional nanoribbons can interact with
two-dimensional sheet of graphite. Using the tight-binding model for graphite,
we show how different configuration of such heterostructures can affect the
electronic structure, in which is different from their components electronic
structure. Namely, a gap of ~0.6 eV can be opened in a bilayer configuration
composed of a layer of gapless armchair nanoribbon stacked on graphene.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过紧束缚模型分析了石墨烯纳米带与石墨烯片层组成的异质结构的电子结构，发现在特定双层构型中，无带隙的扶手椅型纳米带与石墨烯堆叠可以打开约0.6 eV的带隙。
AI.motivation: 研究石墨烯纳米带与石墨烯片层组成的异质结构的电子性质，探索准一维纳米带与二维石墨烯片层相互作用对电子结构的影响。
AI.method: 使用石墨烯的紧束缚模型，分析不同构型的石墨烯纳米带-石墨烯片层异质结构。
AI.result: 发现双层构型（无带隙扶手椅型纳米带堆叠在石墨烯上）可以打开约0.6 eV的带隙，这种电子结构与其组成成分的电子结构不同。
AI.conclusion: 石墨烯纳米带与石墨烯片层组成的异质结构具有独特的电子性质，可以通过构型调控实现带隙工程，为石墨烯基电子器件设计提供了新思路。

title: Improved treatment of relativistic effects in linear augmented plane wave (LAPW) method: application to Ac, Th, ThO2 and UO2
summary:
We examine the influence of the relativistic effects within the linear
augmented plane wave method (LAPW) with the potential of general shape for
solids and suggest a few ways to account them more accurately: (1) we introduce
new radial wave functions based on two actual radial solutions of the Dirac
equation for j=l-1/2 and j=l+1/2 one-electron states; (2) the canonical LAPW
matrix elements for the spherically symmetric component of the potential,
assuming non-relativistic radial wave functions, should be corrected; (3) we
argue that for a realistic spin-orbit energy splitting of the semicore
6p-states the spin-orbit interaction constant zeta(p) should be calculated with
the 6p3/2 radial component; (4) in cases when two j=l +/- 1/2 components are
occupied (for example for the 6p states of actinides) the electron density,
associated with the small components of valence electrons, can be taken into
the calculation scheme. We demonstrate that the new treatment for the
relativistic effects is capable to change the equilibrium lattice constant up
to 0.15~{\AA} and the bulk modulus up to 26 GPa. We find that the electron
density of valence electrons at the nucleus increases by 2.3-4.3 times due to
the inclusion of small components, which can be essential for precise
description of the potential and density close to the nuclear region, important
for nuclear spectroscopies. In contrast to the common believe that in plain
band structure treatment UO2 is a metal, we show that in the presence of the
spin-orbit coupling UO2 has a small gap of forbidden states (0.2-0.4 eV) at the
Fermi level, where the highest occupied and the lowest unoccupied $5f$ bands
slightly overlap, as in calculations of the conduction and valence band in
solid Ge.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了在线性增强平面波方法中更精确处理相对论效应的几种方式，包括引入基于狄拉克方程的新径向波函数、修正矩阵元素、改进自旋轨道耦合计算等，显著影响晶格常数和体模量，并发现UO2在自旋轨道耦合下具有小带隙。
AI.motivation: 传统LAPW方法在处理相对论效应时存在不足，特别是在核区域附近和自旋轨道耦合计算方面需要更精确的处理方法。
AI.method: 引入基于狄拉克方程j=l±1/2态的新径向波函数；修正球形对称势的矩阵元素；使用6p3/2径向分量计算自旋轨道耦合常数；考虑价电子小分量的电子密度贡献。
AI.result: 新方法使平衡晶格常数变化达0.15Å，体模量变化达26GPa；核区域价电子密度增加2.3-4.3倍；发现UO2在自旋轨道耦合下具有0.2-0.4eV的小带隙。
AI.conclusion: 提出的相对论效应处理方法显著提高了计算精度，特别是在核区域和自旋轨道耦合描述方面，纠正了传统认为UO2是金属的错误观点。

title: Novel $H_{\rm c2}$ suppression mechanism in a spin triplet superconductor -- Application to UTe$_2$--
summary:
A novel $H_{\rm c2}$ suppression mechanism is theoretically proposed in a
spin triplet superconductor (SC) with equal spin pairs. We show that the upper
critical field $H_{\rm c2}$ can be reduced from the orbital depairing limit
$H^{\rm orb}_{\rm c2}$ to arbitrarily small value, keeping the second order
phase transition nature. This mechanism is sharply different from the known
Pauli-Clogston limit for a spin singlet SC where the reduction is limited to
$\sim$0.3$H^{\rm orb}_{\rm c2}$ with the first order transition when the Maki
parameter goes infinity. This novel $H_{\rm c2}$ suppression mechanism is
applied to UTe$_2$, which is a prime candidate for a spin triplet SC, to
successfully analyze the $H_{\rm c2}$ data for various crystalline orientations
both under ambient and applied pressure, and to identify the pairing symmetry.
It is concluded that the non-unitary spin triplet state with equal spin pairs
is realized in UTe$_2$, namely $(\hat b+i\hat c)k_a$ in $^3$B$_{\rm 3u}$ which
is classified under finite spin orbit coupling scheme.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种自旋三重态超导体中Hc2抑制的新机制，可将上临界场从轨道退配对极限降低到任意小值，同时保持二阶相变特性。该机制与自旋单重态超导体的泡利-克洛格斯顿极限有本质区别。
AI.motivation: 研究自旋三重态超导体UTe2的上临界场Hc2行为，解释其与常规自旋单重态超导体的差异，特别是Hc2可以远低于轨道退配对极限的现象。
AI.method: 理论提出自旋三重态超导体中Hc2抑制的新机制，并将其应用于UTe2超导体，分析不同晶体取向和环境压力下的Hc2数据。
AI.result: 成功解释了UTe2在不同条件下的Hc2数据，识别出其配对对称性为非幺正自旋三重态(^b+i^c)ka，属于^3B3u表示。
AI.conclusion: UTe2中实现了具有等自旋对的非幺正自旋三重态超导态，这一发现为理解自旋三重态超导体的独特性质提供了重要见解。

title: Parastatistics revealed: Peierls phase twists and shifted conformal towers in interacting periodic chains
summary:
We consider interacting paraparticle chains with a constant $R$-matrix where
the Hamiltonian sums over the internal degrees (flavors) of the paraparticles.
For such flavor-blind Hamiltonians we show a general factorization of the
Hilbert space into occupation and flavor parts with the Hamiltonian acting
non-trivially only on the former. For open boundaries, the spectrum therefore
coincides with that of the occupation Hamiltonian $H_{\rm occ}$ with the flavor
part merely adding degeneracies. For periodic boundaries, a cyclic reordering
of the flavors leads to a separation of $H_{\rm occ}$ into flux sectors at
fixed particle number, thus making the parastatistics directly observable in
the energy spectrum. For important exemplary cases, $H_{\rm occ}$ reduces to
the XXZ chain with flux allowing for an exact solution. In the gapless regime,
this solution shows flux-shifted $c=1$ conformal towers in the low-energy
spectrum and a temperature-dependent chemical potential in the bulk
thermodynamics.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了具有恒定R矩阵的相互作用副粒子链，证明了希尔伯特空间可分解为占据和味道部分，哈密顿量仅作用于占据部分。在开放边界下，谱与占据哈密顿量一致；在周期边界下，副统计量可直接在能谱中观测。
AI.motivation: 研究副粒子链的相互作用，探索副统计量在能谱中的可观测性，以及哈密顿量在希尔伯特空间中的分解特性。
AI.method: 使用恒定R矩阵的副粒子链模型，构建味道无关的哈密顿量，分析开放和周期边界条件下的能谱结构，通过XXZ链模型进行精确求解。
AI.result: 发现希尔伯特空间可分解为占据和味道部分，周期边界下副统计量表现为能谱中的通量扇区，在无能隙区域观测到通量移动的c=1共形塔和温度依赖的化学势。
AI.conclusion: 副统计量在相互作用副粒子链的能谱中可直接观测，哈密顿量的分解特性为研究副统计系统提供了新的理论框架。

title: Toward Spectroscopic Accuracy in Quantum Dynamics Simulations with Fourth-Generation High-Dimensional Committee Neural Network Potentials
summary:
Predictive simulation of vibrational spectra of complex condensed phases and
interfaces with thousands of degrees of freedom has long been a challenging
task of modern condensed matter theory. In this work, fourth-generation
high-dimensional committee neural network potentials (4G-HDCNNPs) are developed
for the first time, using active learning and query-by-committee, and
introduced to the essential nuclear quantum effects (NQEs) as well as
conformational entropy and anharmonicities from path integral (PI) molecular
dynamics simulations. Using representative bulk water and air-water interface
systems, we demonstrate the accuracy of the developed framework in infrared and
vibrational sum frequency generation spectral simulations. Specifically, by
seamlessly integrating non-local charge transfer interactions from 4G-HDCNNPs
with the NQEs from PI methods, our introduced methodology yields accurate
infrared spectra using predicted charges from the 4G-HDCNNP architecture
without explicit training of dipole moments. Our vibrational sum frequency
generation spectra also illustrate high accuracy for the considered air-water
interface system. The introduced framework in this work is general and offers a
benchmark tool and a simple, practical paradigm for predictive spectral
simulations of complex condensed phases and interfaces, free from empirical
parameterizations and/or ad hoc fittings.

AI.tldr: 开发了第四代高维委员会神经网络势能（4G-HDCNNPs），结合路径积分分子动力学模拟，用于准确预测复杂凝聚相和界面的振动光谱。
AI.motivation: 预测具有数千自由度的复杂凝聚相和界面的振动光谱一直是现代凝聚态理论的挑战性任务。
AI.method: 使用主动学习和委员会查询开发4G-HDCNNPs，结合路径积分方法考虑核量子效应、构象熵和非谐性。

title: Strongly Forbidden Thermodynamic Oscillations in Quasi-One-Dimensional Conductors
summary:
We theoretically show that strongly forbidden oscillations of a specific heat
have to exist in metallic phases of some quasi-one-dimensional (Q1D)
conductors. They appear due to electron-electron interactions under condition
of the magnetic breakdown phenomenon between the so-called open interference
electron orbits. We argue that such forbidden thermodynamic oscillations can
exist in Q1D conductors (TMTSF)$_2$ClO$_4$ and (Per)$_2$Au(mnt)$_2$, where
TMTSF stands for tetramethyltetraselenafulvalene, Per is polycyclic aromatic
hydrocarbon and mnt is mononitrotoluene,
  and suggest to discover them.

title: Exchange operation of Majorana zero modes in topological insulator-based Josephson trijunctions
summary:
Majorana zero modes are anyons obeying non-Abelian exchange statistics
distinct from fermions or bosons. While significant progresses have been
achieved in the past two decades in searching for these exotic excitations in
solid-state systems, their non-Abelian nature remains unverified, as definitive
proof requires braiding operations. Here, we report preliminarily experimental
advances in creating, manipulating, and exchanging the presumed Majorana zero
modes in an envelope-shaped Josephson device composed of multiple trijunctions
on a topological insulator surface. We observed the signatures of in-gap states
migration consistent with the expectations of the Fu-Kane model, supporting the
realization of an exchange operation. This work would establish a critical
pathway toward ultimately braiding Majorana zero modes in the Fu-Kane scheme of
topological quantum computation.

AI.tldr: 该论文报告了在拓扑绝缘体表面的约瑟夫森器件中创建、操纵和交换马约拉纳零模的初步实验进展，观察到了与Fu-Kane模型预期一致的能隙内态迁移特征，为实现马约拉纳零模的编织操作迈出了关键一步。
AI.motivation: 马约拉纳零模是遵循非阿贝尔交换统计的任意子，与费米子或玻色子不同。虽然过去二十年中在固态系统中寻找这些奇异激发方面取得了显著进展，但它们的非阿贝尔性质仍未得到验证，因为确凿的证据需要编织操作。
AI.method: 研究使用由多个三结组成的信封形约瑟夫森器件，构建在拓扑绝缘体表面上，通过实验创建、操纵和交换假定的马约拉纳零模。
AI.result: 观察到了与Fu-Kane模型预期一致的能隙内态迁移特征，支持了交换操作的实现。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为最终在Fu-Kane拓扑量子计算方案中编织马约拉纳零模建立了一个关键途径。

title: Atomic-Scale Roughness of Freestanding Oxide Membranes Revealed by Electron Ptychography
summary:
Freestanding oxide films offer significant potential for integrating exotic
quantum functionalities with semiconductor technologies. However, their
performance is critically limited by surface roughness and interfacial
imperfection caused by dangling bonds, which disrupt coherent interactions and
suppress quantum phenomena at heterointerfaces. To address the challenge of
structural characterization of surfaces and interfaces, we develop a
metrological approach achieving atomic-scale precision in mapping the
topography of both free surfaces and buried interfaces within ultrathin oxide
heterostructures leveraging three-dimensional structures reconstructed from
multislice electron ptychography. This method also allows for counting the
number of atoms, even including light elements such as oxygen, along the
electron trajectory in electron microscopy, leading to the identification of
surface termination in oxide films. The planar-view of measurement geometry,
allowing for large field-of-view imaging, provides remarkably rich information
and high statistics about the atomic-scale structural inhomogeneities in
freestanding membranes. This quantitative analysis provides unprecedented
capabilities for correlating structural imperfection with quantum device
performance, offering critical insights for engineering robust heterointerfaces
in next-generation oxide electronics.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种基于多层电子叠层衍射的三维结构重建方法，实现了对超薄氧化物异质结构中自由表面和埋藏界面形貌的原子级精度测绘，并能沿电子轨迹计数原子（包括氧等轻元素），从而识别氧化物薄膜的表面终止。
AI.motivation: 解决独立氧化物薄膜表面粗糙度和界面缺陷对量子现象的限制问题，这些缺陷由悬挂键引起，会破坏相干相互作用并抑制异质界面的量子现象。
AI.method: 利用多层电子叠层衍射重建三维结构，通过平面视图测量几何实现大视场成像，对自由表面和埋藏界面进行原子级精度形貌测绘。
AI.result: 该方法能够识别氧化物薄膜的表面终止，提供关于独立膜中原子尺度结构不均匀性的丰富信息和高统计量，实现了原子级精度的表面和界面表征。
AI.conclusion: 这种定量分析为将结构缺陷与量子器件性能关联提供了前所未有的能力，为下一代氧化物电子学中工程化稳健异质界面提供了关键见解。

title: Experimental signature of transient symmetry breaking in a cavity superconductor
comment: 6 pages, 4 figures, supplemental material is available upon request
summary:
Transient states of matter far from equilibrium may exhibit physical
properties beyond those allowed by the equilibrium-state crystalline
symmetries. We explore ultrafast and direct electronic excitations of transient
states in a cavity superconductor by using time-resolved terahertz-pump
terahertz-probe spectroscopy. Our results show that the strong terahertz field
can transiently modify the symmetries of the electronic subsystems via the
injection of a transient supercurrent, leading to high-order nonlinear
dynamical responses that are not compatible with the equilibrium-state
symmetries, which evidences for transient symmetry breaking on the picosecond
time scale. Our study also finds that the strong coupling of the superconductor
to the designed microcavities enables the sensitive detection of the nonlinear
responses associated to the transient symmetry breaking.

AI.tldr: 利用太赫兹泵浦-太赫兹探测光谱研究腔体超导体中的瞬态对称性破缺，发现强太赫兹场可通过注入瞬态超电流改变电子子系统的对称性，产生与平衡态对称性不兼容的高阶非线性响应。
AI.motivation: 探索远离平衡态的瞬态物质状态可能具有超越平衡态晶体对称性所允许的物理性质，研究超导体中瞬态对称性破缺现象。
AI.method: 使用时间分辨太赫兹泵浦-太赫兹探测光谱技术，通过强太赫兹场激发腔体超导体中的瞬态状态，并利用微腔设计增强非线性响应的检测灵敏度。
AI.result: 强太赫兹场可通过注入瞬态超电流改变电子子系统的对称性，产生与平衡态对称性不兼容的高阶非线性动力学响应，在皮秒时间尺度上观察到瞬态对称性破缺。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明超导体与微腔的强耦合能够灵敏检测与瞬态对称性破缺相关的非线性响应，为研究非平衡态物质性质提供了新途径。

title: Explosive connectivity and mechanical rigidity in cubic lattice structures
summary:
We study explosive connectivity and mechanical rigidity in three-dimensional
cubic lattice structures under Achlioptas-type product-rule dynamics. Our work
combines extensive numerical simulation with the development of a new
theoretical framework. For connectivity, we rigorously establish the presence
of sublinear-width merger-cascade windows for $k\ge 2$, which drive macroscopic
jumps in the order parameter and imply a first-order transition. For rigidity,
we discover numerically that for richly-connected hosts, increasing the number
of choices $k$ monotonically enhances the efficiency of rigidification. To
explain this phenomenon, we propose a theoretical model centered on a
conditional progress function that links an edge's local product-rule score to
its global mechanical utility. We show that this function becomes
non-increasing, thus explaining the observed monotonic efficiency, under two
physically-motivated assumptions. Altogether, our work provides new insights
into the relationship between local dynamics and global connectivity and
rigidity in cubic lattice structures via both theory and computation.

AI.tldr: 研究三维立方晶格结构在Achlioptas型乘积规则动力学下的爆炸性连通性和机械刚性，结合数值模拟和理论框架，发现连通性存在一阶相变，刚性随选择数k增加而单调增强。
AI.motivation: 探索局部动力学如何影响三维立方晶格结构的全局连通性和机械刚性，理解乘积规则在复杂网络形成中的作用机制。
AI.method: 结合广泛的数值模拟和新的理论框架开发，包括建立条件进展函数模型，分析边缘的局部乘积规则得分与全局机械效用之间的关系。
AI.result: 连通性方面严格证明了k≥2时存在亚线性宽度的合并级联窗口，导致序参量的宏观跳跃和一阶相变；刚性方面发现富连接宿主中，增加选择数k单调提高刚性化效率。
AI.conclusion: 通过理论和计算相结合的方法，揭示了局部动力学与全局连通性和刚性之间的关系，为理解立方晶格结构的相变行为提供了新见解。

title: From Wavefunction Sign Structure to Static Correlation
summary:
Static correlation, the breakdown of mean-field theory in correlated
many-fermion systems, can be reframed as a quantitative gauge of the
fermion-sign problem. The variational energy gap between correlated
wavefunctions constrained by mean-field and exact Dirichlet nodes defines a
nodal penalty driven by their topological differences. Method-agnostic and
dictated solely by the sign structure of the wavefunction, this penalty
measures the intrinsic complexity of fermionic correlations. This framework
unifies orbital and real-space views and opens a general route toward a
rigorous, method-independent decomposition of electron correlation, guiding
topology-aware approaches and future node-centric strategies.

AI.tldr: 该论文将静态关联重新定义为费米子符号问题的定量度量，通过变分能量差来量化节点惩罚，揭示了费米子关联的固有复杂性。
AI.motivation: 重新定义静态关联作为费米子符号问题的定量度量，统一轨道和实空间视角，为电子关联的严格分解提供新框架。
AI.method: 通过比较受平均场约束的关联波函数与精确狄利克雷节点之间的变分能量差，定义节点惩罚，该方法与具体方法无关，仅由波函数的符号结构决定。
AI.result: 建立了节点惩罚与费米子关联拓扑差异之间的定量关系，揭示了费米子关联的固有复杂性。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为电子关联的严格分解开辟了通用路径，指导拓扑感知方法和未来以节点为中心的策略。

title: A microscopic model of fractionalized Fermi liquid
summary:
In this short letter we identify a relationship between the Kondo lattice
model formulated in Coleman {\it et.al}, Phys. Rev. Lett. {\bf 129}, 177601
(2022) and Ancilla Layer formulation of the Hubbard model recently proposed by
Zhang and Sachdev.

AI.tldr: 本文发现Kondo晶格模型与Zhang和Sachdev最近提出的Hubbard模型的Ancilla Layer表述之间存在关系
AI.motivation: 探索Kondo晶格模型与Hubbard模型新表述之间的理论联系
AI.method: 通过理论分析识别Coleman等人提出的Kondo晶格模型与Zhang和Sachdev提出的Ancilla Layer Hubbard模型表述之间的关系
AI.result: 发现了两种模型表述之间的具体理论关系
AI.conclusion: 建立了Kondo晶格模型与Hubbard模型Ancilla Layer表述之间的理论联系

title: Intrinsic Moiré Higher-Order Topology Beyond Effective Moiré Lattice Models
summary:
Moir\'e superlattices provide a compelling platform for exploring exotic
correlated physics. Electronic interference within these systems often results
in flat bands with localized electrons, which are typically described by
effective moir\'e lattice models. While conventional models treat moir\'e sites
as indivisible, analogous to atoms in a crystal, this picture overlooks a
crucial distinction: unlike a true atom, a moir\'e site is composed of tens to
thousands of atoms and is therefore spatially divisible. Here, we introduce a
universal mechanism rooted in this spatial divisibility to create topological
boundary states in moir\'e materials. Through tight-binding and density
functional theory calculations, we demonstrate that cutting a moir\'e site with
a physical boundary induces bulk topological polarization, generating robust
boundary states with fractional charges. We further show that when the net edge
polarization is canceled, this mechanism drives the system into an intrinsic
moir\'e higher-order topological insulator (mHOTI) phase. As a concrete
realization, we predict that twisted bilayer tungsten disulfide ($WS_2$) is a
robust mHOTI with experimentally detectable corner states when its boundaries
cut through moir\'e hole sites. Our findings generalize the theoretical
framework of moir\'e higher-order topology, highlight the critical role of edge
terminations, and suggest new opportunities for realizing correlated HOTIs and
higher-order superconductivity in moir\'e platforms.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种在莫尔材料中创建拓扑边界态的通用机制，通过物理边界切割莫尔位点来诱导体拓扑极化，从而产生具有分数电荷的鲁棒边界态。
AI.motivation: 传统莫尔模型将莫尔位点视为不可分割的原子类比，但忽略了莫尔位点由数十到数千个原子组成且具有空间可分性的关键区别。
AI.method: 通过紧束缚模型和密度泛函理论计算，研究物理边界切割莫尔位点如何诱导体拓扑极化。
AI.result: 预测扭曲双层WS2是一个鲁棒的莫尔高阶拓扑绝缘体，具有实验可检测的角态。
AI.conclusion: 该研究推广了莫尔高阶拓扑的理论框架，强调了边缘终止的关键作用，为在莫尔平台中实现相关高阶拓扑绝缘体和高阶超导提供了新机会。

title: Applicability of Electrical Conductivity Ratio Method to Complicated Band Structure and the Carrier Scattering Mechanisms of SnSe
summary:
The electrical conductivity ratio (ECR) method can be used to analyze carrier
scattering mechanism (CSM) without the need of magenetic transport
measurements. In this work, the applicability of the ECR method in the analysis
of complex energy band structures is discussed. Combined with the
thermoelectric properties of SnSe, the feasibility using ECR method of ideal
single band transport model to study the CSM of semiconductor materials with
complicated band structure is studied. The results indicate that ECR method is
not only applicable to idea band structure as reported before but also to the
complicated band structure. The analysis results of the CSM of single crystal
SnSe by ECR method using ideal single-band model agree with the carrier
mobility temperature dependence in the nonphase transition temperature range.
The CSM along three direction of single crystal SnSe are different because of
its anisotropic crystal structure. The difference between dislocation
scattering (DS) and charged impurity scattering (CIS) is that DS is always
accompanied by polar optical phonon scattering (POP), such as the CSM of SnSe
along b axis direction. The difference between CIS and DS can be more easily
distinguished by the ECR method than the carrier mobility temperature dependent
method. DS and POP might be one of the approaches to improve thermoelectric
property because the scattering factor for DS or POP is larger than that of
acoustic phonon scattering (APS) and alloy scattering (AS). For polycrystalline
SnSe, the carrier scattering mechanisms varies with the crystal structure and
the temperature. This indicates that the ECR method can better reflect the
variation of carrier scattering mechanisms with temperature compared to the
carrier mobility temperature dependence method.

AI.tldr: ECR方法可用于分析复杂能带结构中的载流子散射机制，无需磁输运测量。研究发现该方法不仅适用于理想能带结构，也适用于复杂能带结构，且能更好地区分不同散射机制。
AI.motivation: 探讨ECR方法在复杂能带结构中的适用性，研究其在分析半导体材料载流子散射机制方面的可行性。
AI.method: 结合SnSe的热电性能，使用理想单带输运模型的ECR方法研究复杂能带结构半导体材料的载流子散射机制。
AI.result: ECR方法成功分析了单晶SnSe三个方向的载流子散射机制，发现位错散射总是伴随极性光学声子散射，且ECR方法比载流子迁移率温度依赖方法能更好地区分不同散射机制。
AI.conclusion: ECR方法适用于复杂能带结构的载流子散射机制分析，能更好地反映散射机制随温度的变化，位错散射和极性光学声子散射可能是提高热电性能的途径。

title: Current-Gated Orthogonal Superconducting Transistor
summary:
Nonreciprocal charge transport in superconductors enables rectification but
is usually limited to the longitudinal direction. In this work, we show that a
direct current bias injected off principal axes in two-dimensional anisotropic
superconductors converts anisotropy into transverse nonreciprocity, enabling
supercurrent diode effect measurement. This is demonstrated within both a
Ginzburg-Landau framework and self-consistent mean-field calculations. When the
control bias exceeds its critical value, the transverse dissipationless
currents can only flow unidirectionally. This mechanism motivates the design of
a multi-terminal current-gated orthogonal superconducting transistor (CGOST)
and yields simple, bias direction angle-dependent design rules for device
optimization. As direct applications, we propose a tunable supercurrent range
controller and a half-wave rectifier based on the CGOST. Our findings open new
avenues for developing nonreciprocal superconducting electronic devices.

AI.tldr: 在二维各向异性超导体中，偏离主轴注入的直流偏置可将各向异性转化为横向非互易性，实现超电流二极管效应测量。该机制可用于设计多端电流门控正交超导晶体管(CGOST)，并实现可调超电流范围控制器和半波整流器。
AI.motivation: 超导体中的非互易电荷传输通常仅限于纵向方向，本研究旨在探索横向非互易性的实现方法，为开发非互易超导电子器件开辟新途径。
AI.method: 采用金兹堡-朗道框架和自洽平均场计算，研究二维各向异性超导体中偏离主轴注入直流偏置时的横向非互易性。
AI.result: 当控制偏置超过其临界值时，横向无耗散电流只能单向流动，实现了超电流二极管效应。提出了CGOST器件设计及其优化规则。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为开发非互易超导电子器件提供了新的设计思路，包括可调超电流范围控制器和半波整流器等应用。

title: On the Fibonacci-Lucas Ground State Degeneracies of the One-Dimensional Antiferromagnetic Ising Model at Criticality
summary:
This work examines the one-dimensional antiferromagnetic Ising model in a
longitudinal magnetic field, comparing open-chain and closed-ring geometries.
At the nontrivial quantum critical point (QCP) $B_{\mathrm{crit}} = B/J = 2$,
we perform a microcanonical analysis of the ground-state manifold and
explicitly count the number of degenerate configurations. The enumeration
reveals that ground states follow the $N$th Fibonacci sequence for open chains
and the $N$th Lucas sequence for periodic rings, establishing a clear
correspondence between critical degeneracy, topology, and the golden ratio.
This combinatorial duality exposes a number-theoretic structure underlying
quantum criticality and highlights the role of topological constraints in
shaping residual entropy. Beyond its conceptual relevance, the result provides
a compact framework for analyzing degeneracy scaling in one-dimensional spin
systems and may inform future studies of critical phenomena and quantum
thermodynamic devices operating near critical regimes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了一维反铁磁伊辛模型在纵向磁场中的基态简并度，发现开放链和周期环在量子临界点B_crit=2处的基态简并分别遵循斐波那契数列和卢卡斯数列，揭示了临界简并、拓扑结构和黄金比例之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究一维反铁磁伊辛模型在不同几何结构（开放链和周期环）中的基态简并度，探索量子临界点处的简并模式与拓扑约束之间的关系。
AI.method: 在量子临界点B_crit=2处进行微正则分析，显式计数基态流形中的简并构型数量，比较开放链和周期环的简并模式。
AI.result: 发现开放链的基态简并度遵循第N项斐波那契数列，周期环的基态简并度遵循第N项卢卡斯数列，建立了临界简并、拓扑和黄金比例之间的明确对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 这种组合对偶性揭示了量子临界性背后的数论结构，强调了拓扑约束在塑造残余熵中的作用，为分析一维自旋系统的简并标度提供了紧凑框架。

title: Comparison between first-principles supercell calculations of polarons and the ab initio polaron equations
summary:
Polarons are composite quasiparticles formed by excess charges and the
accompanying lattice distortions in solids, and play a critical role in
transport, optical, and catalytic properties of semiconductors and insulators.
The standard approach for calculating polarons from first principles relies on
density functional theory and periodic supercells. An alternative approach
consists of recasting the calculation of polaron wavefunction, lattice
distortion, and energy as a coupled nonlinear eigenvalue problem, using the
band structure, phonon dispersions, and the electron-phonon matrix elements as
obtained from density functional perturbation theory. Here, we revisit the
formal connection between these two approaches, with an emphasis on the
handling of self-interaction correction, and we establish a compact formal link
between them. We perform a quantitative comparison of these methods for the
case of small polarons in the prototypical insulators TiO2, MgO, and LiF. We
find that the polaron wavefunctions and lattice distortions obtained from these
methods are nearly indistinguishable in all cases, and the formation energies
are in good (TiO2) to fair (MgO) agreement. We show that the residual
deviations can be ascribed to the neglect of higher-order electron-phonon
couplings in the density functional perturbation theory approach.

AI.tldr: 本文比较了两种计算极化子的第一性原理方法：基于密度泛函理论的超胞方法和基于密度泛函微扰理论的耦合非线性特征值方法。通过TiO2、MgO和LiF等典型绝缘体中的小极化子案例，发现两种方法得到的极化子波函数和晶格畸变几乎相同，形成能量在TiO2中吻合良好，在MgO中吻合一般。
AI.motivation: 极化子是固体中由过剩电荷和伴随的晶格畸变形成的复合准粒子，对半导体和绝缘体的输运、光学和催化性质至关重要。现有两种主要的第一性原理计算方法需要建立形式联系并进行定量比较。
AI.method: 重新审视了基于密度泛函理论的超胞方法和基于密度泛函微扰理论的耦合非线性特征值方法之间的形式联系，特别关注自相互作用修正的处理。在TiO2、MgO和LiF等典型绝缘体中计算小极化子。
AI.result: 两种方法得到的极化子波函数和晶格畸变在所有情况下几乎无法区分，形成能量在TiO2中吻合良好，在MgO中吻合一般。残余偏差可归因于密度泛函微扰理论方法中忽略了高阶电子-声子耦合。
AI.conclusion: 建立了两种极化子计算方法之间的紧凑形式联系，验证了它们在计算小极化子时的等价性，为第一性原理极化子研究提供了重要的方法学基础。

title: Interference dislocations adjacent to emission spot
summary:
We studied interference dislocations (forks) adjacent to an emission spot in
an interference pattern. The adjacent interference dislocations are observed in
emission of excitons in a monolayer transition metal dichalcogenide and in
emission of spatially indirect excitons, also known as interlayer excitons, in
a van der Waals heterostructure. The simulations show that the adjacent
interference dislocations appear due to the moir\'e effect in combined
interference patterns produced by constituting parts of the emission spot. The
adjacent interference dislocations can appear in interference images for
various spatially modulated emission patterns.

AI.tldr: 研究在干涉图案中发射点附近的干涉位错（叉子）现象，在单层过渡金属二硫化物和范德华异质结构中观察到相邻干涉位错，模拟显示这是由于发射点构成部分产生的组合干涉图案中的莫尔效应所致。
AI.motivation: 研究干涉图案中发射点附近的干涉位错现象，探索其在各种空间调制发射模式中的出现机制。
AI.method: 通过实验观察单层过渡金属二硫化物和范德华异质结构中的激子发射，并进行模拟分析。
AI.result: 在两种材料中都观察到了相邻干涉位错，模拟表明这是由于发射点构成部分产生的组合干涉图案中的莫尔效应所致。
AI.conclusion: 相邻干涉位错可以在各种空间调制发射模式的干涉图像中出现，这是由莫尔效应引起的普遍现象。

title: Altermagnetism and Anomalous Transport in Ag$^{2+}$ Fluorides: KAgF$_3$ and K$_2$AgF$_4$
summary:
Compounds containing Ag$^{2+}$ ion with 4d$^9$ configuration will cause
significant Jahn-Teller distortions and orbital ordering. Such orbital order is
closely related to the magnetic coupling, according to Goodenough-Kanamori
Ruels. Our first-principles calculations reveal that the ground state of
KAgF$_3$ exhibits collinear A-type antiferromagnetic (A-AFM) ordering
accompanied by C-type orbital ordering. In contrast, K$_2$AgF$_4$ adopts a
collinear intralayer antiferromagnetic configuration coupled with ferromagnetic
orbital ordering. The A-AFM KAgF$_3$ presents distinct altermagnetic responses,
including: (i) prominent anomalous transport effects, such as anomalous Hall
conductivity (AHC), anomalous Nernst conductivity (ANC), and thermal anomalous
Hall conductivity (TAHC); and (ii) strong magneto-optical responses, manifested
through pronounced Kerr and Faraday effects. On the other hand, K$_2$AgF$_4$
behaves as a conventional collinear antiferromagnet preserving $\mathcal{PT}$
symmetry, hence precluding the emergence of an anomalous Hall response.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Ag²⁺离子在KAgF₃和K₂AgF₄中的Jahn-Teller畸变和轨道有序化，发现KAgF₃表现出A型反铁磁性和C型轨道有序，具有显著的反常输运和磁光效应，而K₂AgF₄则表现为传统反铁磁体。
AI.motivation: 研究Ag²⁺离子（4d⁹构型）在化合物中的Jahn-Teller畸变和轨道有序化，探索其与磁耦合的关系，以及这些材料中可能出现的反常磁性和输运性质。
AI.method: 使用第一性原理计算分析KAgF₃和K₂AgF₄的基态电子结构、磁序和轨道有序化，评估其反常霍尔效应、反常能斯特效应和磁光响应。
AI.result: KAgF₃呈现A型反铁磁序和C型轨道有序，表现出显著的反常霍尔电导率、反常能斯特电导率和热反常霍尔电导率，以及强烈的克尔和法拉第效应。K₂AgF₄则保持PT对称性，没有反常霍尔响应。
AI.conclusion: KAgF₃是一种具有丰富反常磁性和输运性质的交替磁体，而K₂AgF₄是传统的反铁磁体，两者的差异源于轨道有序化模式的不同。

title: Superconductivity of bilayer two-orbital Hubbard model for La$_{3}$Ni$_{2}$O$_{7}$ under high pressure
summary:
By combining density functional theory (DFT) and density matrix
renormalization group calculations, we investigate the unusual pressure
dependence of superconducting transition temperature ($T_c$) in the nickelate
superconductor La$_{3}$Ni$_{2}$O$_{7}$. Using the hopping integrals and on-site
potentials obtained by fitting the DFT band structures, we map a quantum phase
diagram of a bilayer two-orbital Hubbard model with increasing pressure in a
ladder geometry, which has an intermediate Hubbard repulsion and a Hund's
coupling. Near $3/8$ filling, we find a strong spin density wave order, which
at $3/8$ filling shows a real-space spin pattern similar to the spin-charge
stripe order along a lattice direction. At $21/64$ filling, we find a
superconducting phase with interlayer superconductivity (SC) in both the
$d_{z^2}$ and $d_{x^2-y^2}$ orbitals, as well as in-plane SC in the $d_{z^2}$
orbital. Intriguingly, the SC is weakened with increasing pressure and transits
to a Luttinger liquid above $80$ GPa, which qualitatively agrees with the
experimental observations of decreasing $T_c$ with increasing pressure and a
transition to Fermi liquid above $80$ GPa in La$_{3}$Ni$_{2}$O$_{7}$. Through a
comparative study, we further show that the ratio of interaction to hopping
integral, which reduces moderately with increasing pressure, may play a
dominant role in the weakening of SC. Our results of this experimentally
relevant model not only find a robust SC through suppressing the competing spin
density wave order, but also give new insight into the unusual pressure
dependence of SC in La$_{3}$Ni$_{2}$O$_{7}$.

AI.tldr: 通过结合DFT和密度矩阵重整化群计算，研究了镍基超导体La3Ni2O7中超导转变温度Tc随压力的异常变化。发现超导在压力增加时减弱，在80 GPa以上转变为Luttinger液体，这与实验观察一致。
AI.motivation: 研究La3Ni2O7镍基超导体中Tc随压力的异常变化行为，理解压力对超导的影响机制。
AI.method: 结合密度泛函理论和密度矩阵重整化群计算，构建双层双轨道Hubbard模型，分析不同压力下的量子相图。
AI.result: 在21/64填充处发现超导相，包含层间和面内超导。超导随压力增加而减弱，在80 GPa以上转变为Luttinger液体。相互作用与跳跃积分比的适度降低可能是超导减弱的主要原因。
AI.conclusion: 该研究不仅通过抑制竞争的自旋密度波序发现了稳健的超导相，还为理解La3Ni2O7中SC的异常压力依赖性提供了新见解。

title: Is ruthenium dioxide altermagnet?
comment: invited Perspective for National Science Review, comments welcome
summary:
Ruthenium dioxide was named as one of the first and most promising
altermagnetic candidates with $d$-wave symmetry. We summarize key findings for
this material and critically discuss prospects of making it altermagnetic.

AI.tldr: 该论文讨论了二氧化钌作为d波对称性反铁磁候选材料的潜力和前景
AI.motivation: 二氧化钌被认为是最有前景的反铁磁候选材料之一，具有d波对称性，需要对其关键发现进行总结并批判性讨论其成为反铁磁材料的可能性
AI.method: 通过总结二氧化钌的关键实验和理论发现，并对其进行批判性分析
AI.result: 确认了二氧化钌作为反铁磁候选材料的重要地位，但对其实际成为反铁磁材料的前景进行了审慎评估
AI.conclusion: 虽然二氧化钌是重要的反铁磁候选材料，但其真正实现反铁磁性质的前景仍需进一步验证和讨论

title: Interaction of moire-induced quantum Hall channels in a locally gated graphene junction
summary:
Manipulating electron quantum 1D channels is an important element in the
field of quantum information due to their ballistic and phase coherence
properties. In GaAs and graphene based two dimensional gas systems, these edge
channels have been investigated with both integer and fractional quantum Hall
effects, contributing to the realization of electron interferometer and anyon
braiding. Often, at the p-n junction in the quantum Hall (QH) regime, the
presence of a depletion region due to a band gap or the formation of gaps
between the zeroth Landau levels (zLL) suppresses interaction between the
co-propagating edge channels of opposing doping regimes and helps to preserve
the phase coherence of the channels. Here, we observe a new type of p-n
junction in hexagonal boron nitride aligned graphene that lacks both the zLL
and band gap. In this system, a van Hove singularity (vHS) emerges at the p-n
junctions under magnetic fields of several Tesla, owing to the doping inversion
near the secondary Dirac point. By fabricating devices with independently
tunable global bottom and local top gates, we enable the study of interactions
between p-type and n-type QH edge channels through magnetic breakdown
associated with the vHS. These findings provide valuable insights into the
interactions of superlattice-induced QH edge channels in hBN-aligned graphene.

AI.tldr: 在六方氮化硼对齐石墨烯中发现了一种新型p-n结，该结缺乏零级朗道能级和带隙。在磁场作用下，p-n结处出现范霍夫奇点，通过磁击穿实现了p型和n型量子霍尔边缘通道之间的相互作用研究。
AI.motivation: 研究一维电子量子通道的操控对量子信息领域很重要，传统p-n结中的耗尽区会抑制相互作用，但新型p-n结提供了研究边缘通道相互作用的新平台。
AI.method: 使用具有独立可调全局底栅和局域顶栅的器件，在六方氮化硼对齐石墨烯中构建新型p-n结，通过磁击穿研究p型和n型量子霍尔边缘通道的相互作用。
AI.result: 观察到在几个特斯拉磁场下，p-n结处出现范霍夫奇点，这是由于次级狄拉克点附近的掺杂反转引起的，成功研究了通过磁击穿实现的边缘通道相互作用。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现为理解hBN对齐石墨烯中超晶格诱导的量子霍尔边缘通道相互作用提供了重要见解。

title: The correspondence theory: How supercompatibility conditions, transformations twins, and austenite-martensite interfaces are determined directly from correspondence, metrics and symmetries
summary:
The phenomenological theory of martensite crystallography (PTMC) explains the
main crystallographic and microstructural features of martensite in shape
memory alloys, such as the transformation twins between the martensite
variants, and the interfaces between austenite and martensite bi-variant
laminates. It also permits to determine which austenite and martensite lattice
parameters should be targeted to get supercompatibility, which has driven over
the last decades important research and development of new shape memory alloys
with low hysteresis and high cyclability. First, we show that the cofactor
conditions generally used to define supercompatibility are not necessary
because they are redundant with the invariant plane condition. Second, we
develop an alternative to the PTMC, called correspondence theory (CT). The
mathematical tools of the PTMC come from continuum mechanics (pole
decompositions and stretch tensors); they are advantageously replaced here by
pure crystallographic tools (metric tensors, group of symmetries and
correspondence), which allow direct calculations of the transformation twins
and their generic and non-generic characters. A new symmetric matrix, called
compatibility of metrics by correspondence (CMC) is also introduced. The
supercompatibility condition can now be understood and written as the
degeneracy of a quadratic form of the CMC, or geometrically as the degeneracy
of double-cone into a double-plane, a plane, or the full space. We also show
that for usual martensitic transformations, the different types of habit planes
formed by bi-variant laminates can be determined from the CMC matrix, in a more
rigorous and efficient way than that proposed by the PTMC. The CT does not
differ from the PTMC in its foundations, but is represents a good alternative
to understand and calculate the crystallographic properties of martensite in
shape memory alloys.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了对应理论(CT)作为马氏体晶体学唯象理论(PTMC)的替代方法，使用纯晶体学工具而非连续介质力学工具来分析形状记忆合金中的马氏体相变。
AI.motivation: PTMC虽然能解释马氏体的主要晶体学特征，但其使用的数学工具来自连续介质力学，作者希望开发基于纯晶体学工具的替代方法，以更直接地计算相变孪晶和超相容性条件。
AI.method: 开发了对应理论(CT)，使用度量张量、对称群和对应关系等晶体学工具，引入了相容性度量对应(CMC)对称矩阵，将超相容性条件理解为CMC二次型的退化。
AI.result: 证明了常用的共因子条件对于定义超相容性不是必要的，因为它们与不变平面条件是冗余的。CT方法能够更严谨高效地确定双变体层状结构形成的习惯面。
AI.conclusion: 对应理论与PTMC在基础原理上没有差异，但为理解和计算形状记忆合金中马氏体的晶体学性质提供了一个良好的替代方法。

title: Quantum critical behavior of diluted quasi-one-dimensional Ising chains
comment: 15 pages, 10 figures embedded, submitted to Annalen der Physik
summary:
CoNb$_2$O$_6$ is a unique magnetic material. It features bulk
three-dimensional magnetic order at low temperatures, but its quantum critical
behavior in a magnetic field is well described by the one-dimensional
transverse-field Ising universality class. This behavior is facilitated by the
structural arrangement of magnetic Co$^{2+}$ ions in nearly isolated zig-zag
chains. In this work, we investigate the effect of random site dilution on the
critical properties of such a quasi-one-dimensional quantum Ising system. To
this end, we introduce an anisotropic site-diluted three-dimensional
transverse-field Ising model. We find that site dilution leads to
unconventional activated scaling behavior at the quantum phase transition.
Interestingly, the critical exponents of the quantum critical point are in good
agreement with those of the disordered three-dimensional transverse-field Ising
universality class, despite the strong spatial anisotropy. We discuss the
generality our findings as well as implications for experiments.

AI.tldr: 研究随机位点稀释对CoNb2O6准一维量子伊辛系统临界性质的影响，发现稀释导致量子相变中出现非常规的激活标度行为。
AI.motivation: CoNb2O6是一种独特的磁性材料，具有三维磁序但量子临界行为符合一维横向场伊辛普适类，研究其位点稀释效应有助于理解准一维量子系统的临界性质。
AI.method: 引入各向异性位点稀释的三维横向场伊辛模型，分析随机位点稀释对系统临界行为的影响。
AI.result: 位点稀释导致量子相变中出现非常规的激活标度行为，临界指数与无序三维横向场伊辛普适类一致，尽管存在强空间各向异性。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果具有普遍性，对实验研究具有重要启示意义。

title: Local thermodynamic DOS measurement and twist-angle mapping in graphene-hBN superlattices
summary:
Moir\'e patterns arising from twisted van der Waals stacks fundamentally
reshape their electronic properties, enabling band-structure engineering that
has driven rapidly growing interest in this field. In studying electronic
properties, however, structural disorder present in real devices often leads to
twist-angle inhomogeneity and obscures angle-dependent electronic effects when
measured with bulk-averaged measurements. Probes that can access local
thermodynamic response of the electronic systems with high sensitivity would be
highly valuable. Here, we adopt Kelvin probe force microscopy (KPFM) to locally
investigate graphene-hBN superlattices. By additionally modulating the chemical
potential of the system, we obtain the inverse compressibility with high
signal-to-noise ratio, enabling extraction of the local thermodynamic DOS. From
this information, we determine the local twist angle along the device and find
that twist-angle deviations are strongly correlated with bubble-induced strain
features. Furthermore, by simultaneously tracking the offsets in the contact
potential difference and in the net charge, we identify which interface within
the heterostructure hosts the trapped bubbles. This capability to identify
local electro-chemical environments provides a practical tool for strain-based
studies and future device designs utilizing nanoscale engineering in moir\'e
systems.

AI.tldr: 使用开尔文探针力显微镜（KPFM）研究石墨烯-hBN莫尔超晶格，通过测量局部热力学响应来提取局部扭转角和识别气泡诱导的应变特征。
AI.motivation: 真实器件中的结构无序导致扭转角不均匀性，掩盖了角度依赖的电子效应，需要高灵敏度的局部热力学响应探针来研究莫尔系统的电子特性。
AI.method: 采用开尔文探针力显微镜（KPFM）局部研究石墨烯-hBN超晶格，通过调制化学势获得高信噪比的逆压缩率，从而提取局部热力学态密度。
AI.result: 确定了器件中的局部扭转角，发现扭转角偏差与气泡诱导的应变特征强相关，并识别了异质结构中捕获气泡的界面位置。
AI.conclusion: 这种识别局部电化学环境的能力为基于应变的研究和未来在莫尔系统中利用纳米尺度工程的器件设计提供了实用工具。

title: Crystalline and vitreous tellurides of silicon
comment: Monography, 327 pages, in Ukrainian language. ISBN 978-617-8390-87-7
summary:
This monograph presents the results of experimental and theoretical studies
of binary and ternary crystalline and vitreous silicon tellurides. It provides
a detailed description of the methods for synthesizing and growing bulk and
nanostructured binary crystals of Si2Te3, SiTe2, and ternary crystals known in
the M-Si-Te systems (M = Na, K, Cu, Ag, Al, In), as well as sodium-silicon and
tellurium-silicon clathrates. Significant attention is paid to the results of
investigations into their electronic structure, optical, electrical,
photoelectric, and photoluminescent properties.The publication is intended for
researchers and specialists in the fields of semiconductor materials science,
physics, and semiconductor technology, as well as lecturers, postgraduate
students, and students of relevant specialties.

AI.tldr: 对二元和三元晶体及玻璃态硅碲化物的实验与理论研究，包括合成方法、电子结构及光电性能分析
AI.motivation: 系统研究硅碲化物材料的合成、生长及其物理性质，为半导体材料科学提供基础数据
AI.method: 采用实验合成与理论分析相结合的方法，研究Si2Te3、SiTe2等二元晶体及M-Si-Te三元体系的合成、生长和性能表征
AI.result: 详细描述了硅碲化物材料的合成方法、电子结构、光学、电学、光电和光致发光性质
